name: Solitaire Classic: Klondike!
description:
Enjoy HD graphics with Solitaire Classic: Klondike! Customize your Card Faces, Card Backs and Backgrounds. Solitaire Classic: Klondike! provides you with a modern Interface that is just beautiful to look at!

Features:
- Draw 1 or 3 cards Modes
- Normal & Vegas Modes
- Play and Increase your Level
- With Timer, Moves Counter & Statistics of your games
- Badges & Achievements to Unlock
- Supports different Languages
- Customizable Card Faces, Card Backs & Backgrounds
- Supports Game Center leaderboards
- A Quicker way to Undo: Press & Hold Undo to perform a series of undos
- Auto Complete for Easy Finishing
- Tons of Settings
- Supports Save & Load
